verses.verse: Now the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>had<s%> <S%H3045>relations<s%> with his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2332>Eve,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7069>gotten<s%> a <S%H376>manchild<s%> with [the help of] the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

And <S%H3254>again,<s%> she <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1893>Abel.<s%> And <S%H1893>Abel<s%> was a <S%H7462>keeper<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> but <S%H7014>Cain<s%> was a <S%H5647>tiller<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H4480>course<s%> <S%H7093><s%> of <S%H3117>time<s%> that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

And <S%H1893>Abel,<s%> on his <S%H1571>part<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> of the <S%H1060>firstlings<s%> of his <S%H6629>flock<s%> and of their <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H2459>portions.<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8159>had<s%> <S%H8159>regard<s%> for <S%H1893>Abel<s%> and for his <S%H4503>offering;<s%>

but for <S%H7014>Cain<s%> and for his <S%H4503>offering<s%> He <S%H8159>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8159>regard.<s%> So <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H2734>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> and his <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H5307>fell.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> are you <S%H2734>angry<s%>? And <S%H4100>why<s%> has your <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%>?

<S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> will not [your countenance] be <S%H7613>lifted<s%> up? And <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> <S%H9128>sin<s%> is <S%H7257>crouching<s%> at the <S%H6607>door;<s%> and its <S%H8669>desire<s%> is for you, but you must <S%H4910>master<s%> it."

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when they were in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> him.

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H335>"Where<s%> is <S%H1893>Abel<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I do not <S%H3045>know.<s%> Am I my brother's <S%H8104>keeper<s%>?"
And He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%>? The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your brother's <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H6817>crying<s%> to Me from the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> you are <S%H779>cursed<s%> from the <S%H127>ground,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H6475>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> your brother's <S%H1818>blood<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H5647>cultivate<s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%> it shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H3581>strength<s%> to you; you shall be a <S%H5128>vagrant<s%> and a <S%H5110>wanderer<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "My <S%H5771>punishment<s%> is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> to <S%H5375>bear!<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> Thou hast <S%H1644>driven<s%> me this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%> and from Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> I shall be <S%H5641>hidden,<s%> and I shall be a <S%H5128>vagrant<s%> and a <S%H5110>wanderer<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> me will <S%H2026>kill<s%> me."

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H2026>kills<s%> <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> will be <S%H5358>taken<s%> on him <S%H7659>sevenfold.<s%>" And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> for <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H1115>lest<s%> <S%H3605>anyone<s%> <S%H4672>finding<s%> him should <S%H5221>slay<s%> him.

Then <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3427>settled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5113>Nod,<s%> <S%H6926>east<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden.<s%>

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H3045>had<s%> <S%H3045>relations<s%> with his <S%H802>wife<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H2585>Enoch;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H2585>Enoch,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now to <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5897>Irad;<s%> and <S%H5897>Irad<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4232>Mehujael;<s%> and <S%H4232>Mehujael<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4967>Methushael;<s%> and <S%H4967>Methushael<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech.<s%>

And <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> to himself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H5711>Adah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other,<s%> <S%H6741>Zillah.<s%>
And <S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H2989>Jabal;<s%> he was the father of those who <S%H1>dwell<s%> in <S%H3427>tents<s%> and [have] <S%H168>livestock.<s%>
And his brother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3106>Jubal;<s%> he was the father of <S%H1>all<s%> those who <S%H3605>play<s%> the <S%H8610>lyre<s%> and <S%H3658>pipe.<s%>

As for <S%H6741>Zillah,<s%> she <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to Tubal-cain, the <S%H3913>forger<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9177>implements<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> and <S%H1270>iron;<s%> and the <S%H269>sister<s%> of Tubal-cain was <S%H5279>Naamah.<s%>

And <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H5711>"Adah<s%> and <S%H6741>Zillah,<s%> <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> You <S%H802>wives<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech,<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>heed<s%> to my <S%H565>speech,<s%> For I have <S%H2026>killed<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H6482>wounding<s%> me; And a <S%H3206>boy<s%> for <S%H2250>striking<s%> me;
<S%H3588>If<s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%> is <S%H5358>avenged<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold,<s%> Then <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> seventy-sevenfold."

And <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H3045>had<s%> <S%H3045>relations<s%> with his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5750>again;<s%> and she <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H8352>Seth,<s%> for, [she said,] <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H7896>appointed<s%> me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2233>offspring<s%> in <S%H8478>place<s%> of <S%H1893>Abel;<s%> for <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> him."

And to <S%H8352>Seth,<s%> to him <S%H1571>also<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> was <S%H3205>born;<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H583>Enosh.<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> [men] <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
